description.zh-cn: 北洋军阀执政时期奉系军阀重要将领，有“智囊”、“小诸葛”之称。
description.en: An important general of the Fengtian clique during the Beiyang government era, known as the 'mastermind' and 'little Zhuge'.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名爱国将领、政治家，奉系军阀领袖张作霖长子，皇姑屯事件后继承其父在东北的势力。
description.en: A famous patriotic general and statesman in modern China, the eldest son of Fengtian clique leader Zhang Zuolin. He inherited his father's power in Northeast China after the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任黑龙江省政府主席，后与杨宇霆一同被张学良处决。
description.en: A political figure of the Republic of China, served as the chairman of the Heilongjiang provincial government, and was executed along with Yang Yuting by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 张学良时期的警务处长，奉命处决了杨宇霆和常荫槐。
description.en: Chief of Police Affairs under Zhang Xueliang, who was ordered to execute Yang Yuting and Chang Yinhuai.

description.zh-cn: 北洋军阀奉系首领，中华民国陆海军大元帅，张学良之父。在皇姑屯事件中被刺杀。
description.en: Leader of the Fengtian clique of Beiyang warlords, Grand Marshal of the Army and Navy of the Republic of China, and father of Zhang Xueliang. He was assassinated in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 奉系将领，张学良的恩师。因遭杨宇霆排挤等原因起兵反奉，兵败后被处死。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique and a mentor to Zhang Xueliang. He rebelled against the Fengtian clique due to being sidelined by Yang Yuting and other reasons, and was executed after his defeat.

description.zh-cn: 直系军阀首领之一，曾任浙江军务督办，与奉军在江苏发生冲突。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Zhili clique, served as the military governor of Zhejiang, and clashed with the Fengtian army in Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾在江苏与孙传芳联合袭击奉军。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who, along with Sun Chuanfang, attacked the Fengtian army in Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 皖系军阀的重要人物，曾任奉军副司令，与张作霖不和。
description.en: An important figure in the Anhui clique, once served as deputy commander of the Fengtian army, and was at odds with Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 直系将领，于1918年被徐树铮枪杀。
description.en: A general of the Zhili clique who was shot dead by Xu Shuzheng in 1918.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，新桂系代表人物。曾与杨宇霆在冀东会晤。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army and a representative figure of the New Guangxi clique. He met with Yang Yuting in eastern Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 杨宇霆长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Yang Yuting.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀的派系之一，以张作霖为首领，控制中国东北地区。
description.en: One of the factions of the Beiyang warlords in the Republic of China, led by Zhang Zuolin, controlling the Northeast region of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期的一个重要军事政治集团，由袁世凯的北洋军演变而来。
description.en: An important military and political group in the early Republic of China, evolved from Yuan Shikai's Beiyang Army.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 日本培养陆军军官的教育机构，许多中国近代军事人物曾在此留学。
description.en: An educational institution in Japan for training army officers, where many modern Chinese military figures studied.

description.zh-cn: 日本关东军策划的，针对奉系军阀首领张作霖的暗杀事件。
description.en: An assassination plot against Zhang Zuolin, leader of the Fengtian clique, planned by the Japanese Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 张学良宣布东三省服从南京国民政府，改变旗帜的政治事件，标志着北伐的结束和中国名义上的统一。
description.en: A political event where Zhang Xueliang announced that the three northeastern provinces would obey the Nationalist Government in Nanjing and change their flag, marking the end of the Northern Expedition and the nominal unification of China.

description.zh-cn: 1924年发生于中国直系军阀和奉系军阀之间的战争。
description.en: A war between the Zhili and Fengtian warlord cliques in China that took place in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 由于争夺大权，张学良派高纪毅将杨宇霆秘密处决于元帅府“老虎厅”。
description.en: Due to a power struggle, Zhang Xueliang ordered Gao Jiyi to secretly execute Yang Yuting at the 'Tiger Hall' of the Marshal's Mansion.

description.zh-cn: 张学良将常荫槐与杨宇霆一同秘密处决。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang had Chang Yinhuai secretly executed along with Yang Yuting.

description.zh-cn: 自郭松龄事件后，张学良深恨杨宇霆。杨宇霆亦对张学良不敬，时常讥讽，最终张学良认定其欲夺权而将其处死。
description.en: Since the Guo Songling incident, Zhang Xueliang deeply hated Yang Yuting. Yang also showed disrespect to Zhang Xueliang, often mocking him, which led Zhang to believe Yang intended to usurp power, resulting in his execution.

description.zh-cn: 杨宇霆深受张作霖信任，历任奉军参谋长、东北陆军训练总监等要职。
description.en: Yang Yuting was deeply trusted by Zhang Zuolin and held key positions such as Chief of Staff of the Fengtian Army and Inspector-General of the Northeast Army Training.

description.zh-cn: 杨宇霆是奉系军阀的重要将领。
description.en: Yang Yuting was an important general of the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 奉系是北洋军阀的主要派系之一。
description.en: The Fengtian clique was one of the main factions of the Beiyang warlords.

description.zh-cn: 杨宇霆长期担任奉军总参谋长等职务。
description.en: Yang Yuting served as the Chief of General Staff of the Fengtian Army for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 杨宇霆毕业于日本陆军士官学校第八期砲兵科。
description.en: Yang Yuting graduated from the 8th class of the artillery department of the Imperial Japanese Army Academy.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖在皇姑屯事件中被日本关东军刺杀身亡。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin was assassinated by the Japanese Kwantung Army in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄素遭杨宇霆排挤，这是其起兵反奉的原因之一。
description.en: Guo Songling was consistently sidelined by Yang Yuting, which was one of the reasons for his rebellion against the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄于1925年起兵反奉。
description.en: Guo Songling launched a rebellion against the Fengtian clique in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄兵败后被奉军处死。
description.en: After his military defeat, Guo Songling was executed by the Fengtian army.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄是张学良的恩师。
description.en: Guo Songling was Zhang Xueliang's mentor.

description.zh-cn: 杨宇霆坚决反对东北易帜，认为不应该服从蒋介石。
description.en: Yang Yuting firmly opposed the Northeast Flag Replacement, believing that they should not submit to Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 1925年，孙传芳联合陈调元在江苏袭击奉军，将其击败。
description.en: In 1925, Sun Chuanfang, along with Chen Tiaoyuan, attacked and defeated the Fengtian army in Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 1925年，陈调元与孙传芳联合在江苏袭击奉军，将其击败。
description.en: In 1925, Chen Tiaoyuan, along with Sun Chuanfang, attacked and defeated the Fengtian army in Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 第二次直奉战争奉军获胜后，杨宇霆被任命为江苏军务督办。
description.en: After the Fengtian clique's victory in the Second Zhili–Fengtian War, Yang Yuting was appointed as the military governor of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 张学良是张作霖的长子。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang is the eldest son of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 杨春元是杨宇霆的长子。
description.en: Yang Chunyuan is the eldest son of Yang Yuting.

description.zh-cn: 1928年9月，杨宇霆两次与白崇禧在冀东会晤。
description.en: In September 1928, Yang Yuting met with Bai Chongxi twice in eastern Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 1918年，徐树铮在天津枪杀直系将领陆建章。
description.en: In 1918, Xu Shuzheng shot and killed Zhili clique general Lu Jianzhang in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 徐树铮枪杀陆建章后，张作霖与徐树铮不和。
description.en: After Xu Shuzheng killed Lu Jianzhang, Zhang Zuolin and Xu were at odds.
